cu.explanation_en: Setting the hardware log level to an unknown enum value will cause the logging configuration to fail and may prevent proper hardware-related logging.

du.explanation_en: Setting the hardware log level to an unknown enum value will cause the logging configuration to fail and may prevent proper hardware-related logging.
du.explanation_zh: 將硬體日誌級別設定為未知的枚舉值會導致日誌配置失敗，並可能阻止正確的硬體相關日誌記錄。
